washed2.text_male: Hahahaha. No, no, have a look, he shat himself.
washed2.text_female: Hahahaha. No, no, have a look, she shat herself.

washed2.text: Anna, do you have your phone? Take a picture!!

notWashed.text: You should wash your clothes. Your trousers are a real mess.
Don't you have a washing machine at home?

notWashed2.text: Hahahaha. New trend! Chewing gums stuck to the trousers.
That awful clothing is not worth washing.

notWashed2.text_male: He should throw it straight to the trash can.
notWashed2.text_female: She should throw it straight to the trash can.

washed2.text: Well, it's okay. It'll be dry in a little while.

notTalked.text: You've probably sat on a chewing gum.

notTalked2.text: What a mess. Go straight to the restroom before class.

notTalked3.text: Yeah, maybe you're able to remove it.

talked.text: Try to take that gum off in the restroom.
